document.full_text: the miami heat produced a stirring second half fightback, which included an 18-0 run, to surge to a 100-94 victory over the detroit pistons on wednesday.
document.title: miami turn up heat to dismantle pistons
lines_and_colors: the miami heat produced a stirring second half fightback, which included an 18-0 run, to surge to a 100-94 victory over the detroit pistons on wednesday.
